mapper.select: select t.ID id, t.RESOURCE_NAME resourceName, t.RESOURCE_URL resourceUrl, t.IMAGE_URL imageUrl, t.ORDER_NUMBER orderNumber, t.PARENT_ID parentId, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate from t_sys_resource t LEFT JOIN t_mapping_role_resource b ON t.ID=b.RESOURCE_ID where b.ROLE_ID=#{roleId} AND t.DELETE_FLAG='1' AND b.DELETE_FLAG='1'

select t.ID id, t.RESOURCE_NAME resourceName, t.RESOURCE_URL resourceUrl, t.IMAGE_URL imageUrl, t.ORDER_NUMBER orderNumber, t.PARENT_ID parentId, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate from t_sys_resource t where t.DELETE_FLAG='1'
